column1: In 2023,  Sri  Lanka  saw a  significant  surge  in  tourism,  welcoming 1,487,303  visitors, which
marked a 106.5% increase from the previous year. This notable rise highlights the growing
interest  in  Sri  Lanka  as  a  preferred  travel  destination.  Contributing  factors  could  include
improved  safety  and  political  stability,  effective  marketing  campaigns  enhanced
connectivity, investments in tourism infrastructure, and positive international recognition. This
growth signifies the country's recovery and potential for continued expansion in the tourism
